channel.title: OUR SERVICES
channel.description: Cpaesmite Consulting - International Commerce And Logistics

item.title: Support to foreign companies in Uruguay and Paraguay
item.description:
We know that entering a new region or country is a challenge for companies. To minimize risks, adapt without extra costs to the idiosyncrasies of the country and achieve a quick insertion into the market, it is essential to have a local connection. Based on this concept, we offer our support to enterprises in the following areas:

 

  • Investment allocation
  • Management control and reporting abroad
  • Financial and management audits
  • Temporary management of business

item.title: Process reengineering
item.description:
Currently the only constant is change, companies grow, economy and markets evolve,  international commerce is becoming more dynamic and so is therefore the logistic associated with it. Enterprises must necessarily adapt, evolving with the environment around them if they are not to be stuck in the road.

In this context, we support companies in their development, focusing our contribution on the design, adaptation and development of the different processes of their business. We deal with processes from the administrative, commercial and operating ones to those of direction, always pointing at team work.

item.title: Planning, analysis and control of economic-financial management
item.description:
Currently, it is vital to have a working system that will allow a correct economic-financial management for any kind of company. Its competitiveness, sustainability and development will depend on that, independently of its size.

In such sense, we support and develop processes of planning, analysis and economic-financial management control of companies, based on solid information systems and in line with their necessities. Our specific proposal consist of working together in some or all of the following areas:

 

  • Design and implementation of information system (based on accounting and non-accounting data)
  • Economic-financial analysis
  • Economic-financial planning
  • Management control
  • Economic-financial management

item.title: Planning and analysis of new business projects
item.description:
Each new undertaking implies risks and potential opportunities.

We provide tools that allow companies to reduce these risks and maximize opportunities, among others:

 

  • Business plan elaboration
  • Feasibility  studies execution (economic-financial)
  • Due  diligence

item.title: Optimization and development of foreign trade processes
item.description:
Foreign trade processes involve a large number of interrelated sub processes, all of vital importance for the company. A strong bond among the various links of the supply chain and specially the achievement of synergic relations among them is essential.

We provide companies interested in initiating, developing, consolidating and/or improving processes of international commerce with optimal working forms consistent with their realities as a way of achieving an increment of their competitiveness and profit value. Consulting in foreign trade processes focuses on the following services:

 

 

  • Analysis and optimization of foreign trade processes
  • Support in the development of new international business
